name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Keegan SHINHOLSTER, Petitioner
docket_number: Petition No. 636 Eastern District Allocatur Docket 1996

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Keegan SHINHOLSTER, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 6th day of October, 1998, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED. The order of the Superior Court is reversed. This case is remanded to the Philadelphia County Court of Common Pleas for further proceedings consistent with this court’s decision in Commonwealth v. Jackson, 548 Pa. 484, 698 A.2d 571 (1997).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
718 A.2d 1246
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Keegan SHINHOLSTER, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 6, 1998.
